actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require additional disclosure for pharmaceutical companies.
short_title: Disclosing Pharmaceutical Company Windfall Profits Act of 2018

summary.text:
Disclosing Pharmaceutical Company Windfall Profits Act of 2018 

This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require pharmaceutical companies to make certain public disclosures, including disclosures related to taxation, compensation, dividends, and spending on research and development.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require additional disclosure for pharmaceutical companies.
